result.reason: The request does not specify whether ODBC is for connection storage, import/export, or a new protocol, so scope and acceptance criteria are missing.
result.approach: Ask for the exact ODBC use case (provider/DSN/auth/read-write expectations), then add an ODBC connector path, wire it into options UI, and cover it with integration tests.
